title: Hollow Knight
description: A challenging action-adventure set in the ruined kingdom of Hallownest, featuring fluid combat, exploration, and atmospheric design.

title: Dead Cells
description: A roguelike action-platformer with fast-paced combat, procedurally generated levels, and a wide arsenal of weapons and abilities.

title: Katana ZERO
description: A stylish neo-noir action platformer featuring instant-death combat, time manipulation, and a gripping narrative.

title: Cuphead
description: A run-and-gun action game inspired by 1930s cartoons, known for its hand-drawn animation, tough bosses, and jazzy soundtrack.

title: Enter the Gungeon
description: A bullet-hell dungeon crawler where players fight through procedurally generated levels to find a gun that can kill the past.

title: Hotline Miami
description: A brutal top-down action game with fast-paced combat, surreal storytelling, and a legendary synthwave soundtrack.

title: Risk of Rain 2
description: A roguelike third-person shooter where players fight hordes of enemies, collect items, and scale difficulty as time progresses.

title: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth
description: A roguelike dungeon crawler with randomly generated levels, grotesque enemies, and hundreds of items to discover.

title: Furi
description: A fast-paced action game focused on intense boss battles, blending hack-and-slash combat with bullet-hell mechanics.

title: Hyper Light Drifter
description: A 2D action RPG with fast-paced combat, pixel art visuals, and a mysterious world inspired by classic 8-bit and 16-bit games.
